Case# MPMovieSourceType.streaming

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
case streaming
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieSourceType/streaming#Discussion)

The movie is a live or on-demand stream.
